text: Agar tum log faisla chahatay ho to woh faisla tumharay samney aa mojood hua aur agar baaz ajao to yeh tumharay liye nihayat khoob hai aur agar tum phir wohi kaam kero gay to hum bhi phir wohi kaam keren gay aur tumhari jamiyat tumharay zara bhi kaam na aaye gi go kitni ziyada ho aur waqaee baat yeh hai kay Allah Taalaa eman walon kay sath hai
